name: webwhispr
description: Privacy-respecting voice input for any text field in your browser. Transcribes speech using Whisper AI running entirely in your browser.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && npm run build:content && npm run build:background && npm run build:offscreen && cp -r src/popup dist/ && cp -r src/offscreen/*.html dist/offscreen/ && cp -r icons dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
